full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUN DRUG GI RNAL 'BYOR ZAB MO DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(DE LTAR BLANG DANG RDOR BYA'I 'BRAS CAN GYI, ,RGYU RKYEN RTEN 'BYUNG MI BSLUR NGES RNYED NAS, ,LUS SROG YAL BAR GYUR KYANG MI GTONG BAR, SNYING STOBS CHEN POS DAM CHOS 'DZIN PAR SHOG , ,,'DI BRIS DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN 'GRO BA KUN, ,RGYAL BA'I DAM CHOS MA LUS 'DZIN PA DANG, RGYAL SRAS KUN GYI SPYOD PA NAM RDZOGS SNYAM, ,SPRANG RGAN MI BSKYOD RDO RJES SMIN NI BGYI, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
